exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>
header:
<js>
header = {
    "Referer": baseUrl
};
JSON.stringify(header);
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
initUrl = book.bookUrl;
url = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? initUrl : initUrl.replace('novel', 'api/novel');
body = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? result : java.ajax(url);
if (body.includes('ID不合适，应当使用')) {
    match = body.match(/\/\w+\/[\w-]+/);
    url = `${book.origin}/api/novel${match}`;
    body = java.ajax(url);
}
if (body.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
    java.toast("当前会话已失效，请重新登录");
}
java.put('url', url);
body
</js>

value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
result = JSON.parse(result);
intro = ['5', '8', '9'].includes(value) ? result.introductionJp : result.introductionZh || result.introductionJp;
timeStamp = '{{$.toc[-1].createAt}}' || '{{$.syncAt}}';
intro = '  📬最近' + ('{{$.toc[-1].createAt}}' ? '更新' : '同步') + '：' + java.timeFormat(timeStamp * 1000) + '\n‎\n' + intro;
intro
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name:
<js>
value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
result = JSON.parse(result);
name = ['5', '8', '9'].includes(value) ? result.titleJp : result.titleZh || result.titleJp;
name
</js>

ruleContent.content: value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable()); get = (value >= '1' && value <= '9') ? value : '1'; config = { 1: 'sakuraParagraphs', 2: 'gptParagraphs', 3: 'youdaoParagraphs', 4: 'baiduParagraphs', 5: 'paragraphs' }; result = JSON.parse(result); content = result[config[get]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]] || result[config[5]]; if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) { type = ['6', '8'].includes(get); jpContent = result[config[5]]; cnContent = result[config[1]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]]; if (cnContent) { content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => (type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<图片>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>
variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){

result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

ruleSearch.author: .author@text##\/.*
ruleSearch.lastChapter: .new@text##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleSearch.name: h3@text

ruleToc.chapterName:
text##^\d+\.|（.*合.*|（含.*|\(.*合.*|\(含.*
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节|免费章节.|章节目录)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=[
"----------     🏷标签     ----------::::1",
"进击的巨人::进击的巨人::::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

GitHub：https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado
# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）
- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");

    }
}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var scripts = document.select("script");

var result = []; // 用于存储最终的 JSON 数据

for (var i = 0; i < scripts.size(); i++) {
    var script = scripts.get(i);
    var scriptContent = script.data();

    // 匹配 self.__next_f.push 的内容
    var regex = /self\.__next_f\.push\((.*)\)/gs; // 使用 /gs 修饰符匹配多行
    var matches = [];
    var match;

    // 遍历所有匹配结果，保留最后一个
    while ((match = regex.exec(scriptContent)) !== null) {
        matches.push(match[1]);
    }

    // 只处理最后一个匹配的内容
    if (matches.length > 0) {
        var content = matches[matches.length - 1]; // 获取最后一个匹配的内容

        // 预处理：将英文逗号（,）替换为 ",\n"
        content = content.replace(/,/g, ",\n");

        // 打印预处理后的结果
        //java.log(content);

        // 匹配 "children":"(.*)" 和 "href":"(.*)" 的正则表达式
        var childrenRegex = /.*?"children.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var hrefRegex = /.*?"href.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var imgRegex = /.*?"src.*?":.*?"(.*)\\/g;

        var childrenMatches = [];
        var hrefMatches = [];
        var imgMatches = [];

        // 提取匹配的内容
        while ((match = childrenRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 过滤掉以 "$" 开头的 children 内容
            if (!match[1].startsWith("$")) {
                childrenMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = hrefRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 只匹配以 "/comic.*" 开头的 href 内容
            if (match[1].startsWith("/comic")) {
                hrefMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = imgRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 只匹配以 ".jpg" 结尾的 src 内容
            if (match[1].endsWith(".jpg")) {
                imgMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }

        // 从第2个 "children" 开始处理
        var startIdx = 2; // 第2个元素的索引为12
        if (childrenMatches.length > startIdx) {
            // 按每5个children分组
            for (var j = 0; j < hrefMatches.length; j++) {
                var group = {
                    name: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5] || "",
                    latestChapterTitle: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5 + 1] || "",
                    kind: childrenMatches.slice(startIdx + j * 5 + 2, startIdx + j * 5 + 5).join(", "),
                    url: hrefMatches[j] || "",
                    img: imgMatches[j] || "" // 如果没有图片，使用默认值
                };
                result.push(group);
            }
        }
    }
}

// 输出 JSON 模板
var jsonTemplate = JSON.stringify(result, null, 4);
java.log(jsonTemplate); // 或者其他方式输出

</js>
$[*]

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
hi=java.get("hi");
hia=hi.match(/pageStart=(\d+)/)[1]
java.log(hia)
a = java.get("c");
b=String(a).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,'$1').replace(/\"/g,'').replace(/\s/g,'');
//java.log(b)
if (typeof b == 'string') {
    b = b.split(','); 
}
//java.log(nextChapterUrl)
c = nextChapterUrl.match(/pageStart= {0,1}(\d+)/);
c = parseInt(c[1]); 
results = [];
for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
        currentPage = parseInt(b[i]);
        if (isNaN(currentPage)) {
            continue;
        }
        if (currentPage > c) {
            break;
        }
        if (currentPage > hia && currentPage < c) {
            url = baseUrl.replace(/(pageStart=)\d+/, '$1' + currentPage);
            results.push(url);
        }
    }results
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, ch = {};
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
var b=$.page
$.c=java.log(JSON.stringify(b))
java.put("c",$.c)
while(j<l) {
  if (i<k) {
    ch = $.chapter[i];
    while(+ch.pos>$.page[j]) {
      ch.no = $.page[j];
      ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
      $.page[j] = ch;
      j++;
    }
    i++;
  } else {
    ch = $.chapter[k-1];
    ch.no = $.page[j];
    ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
    $.page[j] = ch;
    j++;
  }
}
JSON.stringify($.page);
</js>

.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

con=`{{@@#author_say@html}}`
iv=src.match(/iv":"(.+?)"/)[1]
key=java.hexDecodeToByteArray('a15e2a7afc8c34a526efb8c6495e7b26')
	iv=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(iv)
	enc=src.match(/enc":"(.+?)"/)[1]
	enc=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(enc)
	c=java.createSymmetricCrypto('AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding',key, iv)
	b=c.decryptStr(enc)
b+con

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
📜 篇幅：{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.brief@text##小说简介：}}`;
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//处理重新获取文本时可能会出现的错误。
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`未获取到文本，正在重试...（当前第${retryCount}次重试）`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "重试三次仍然未获取到文本，请检查网络状况。"
}
result;
</js>

//java.log(nextChapterUrl)
c = nextChapterUrl.match(/pageStart= {0,1}(\d+)/);
c = parseInt(c[1]); 
results = [];
for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
        currentPage = parseInt(b[i]);
        if (isNaN(currentPage)) {
            continue;
        }
        if (currentPage > c) {
            break;
        }
        if (currentPage > hia && currentPage < c) {
            url = baseUrl.replace(/(pageStart=)\d+/, '$1' + currentPage);
            results.push(url);
        }
    }results
</js>

}

<js>
hi=java.get("hi");
hia=hi.match(/pageStart=(\d+)/)[1]
java.log(hia)
a = java.get("c");
b=String(a).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,'$1').replace(/\"/g,'').replace(/\s/g,'');
//java.log(b)
if (typeof b == 'string') {
    b = b.split(','); 
}
//java.log(nextChapterUrl)
c = nextChapterUrl.match(/pageStart= {0,1}(\d+)/);
c = parseInt(c[1]); 
results = [];
for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
        currentPage = parseInt(b[i]);
        if (isNaN(currentPage)) {
            continue;
        }
        if (currentPage > c) {
            break;
        }
        if (currentPage > hia && currentPage < c) {
            url = baseUrl.replace(/(pageStart=)\d+/, '$1' + currentPage);
            results.push(url);
        }
    }results
</js>

<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, ch = {};
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
var b=$.page
$.c=java.log(JSON.stringify(b))
java.put("c",$.c)
while(j<l) {
  if (i<k) {
    ch = $.chapter[i];
    while(+ch.pos>$.page[j]) {
      ch.no = $.page[j];
      ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
      $.page[j] = ch;
      j++;
    }
    i++;
  } else {
    ch = $.chapter[k-1];
    ch.no = $.page[j];
    ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
    $.page[j] = ch;
    j++;
  }
}
JSON.stringify($.page);
</js>

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

@js:
con=`{{@@#author_say@html}}`
iv=src.match(/iv":"(.+?)"/)[1]
key=java.hexDecodeToByteArray('a15e2a7afc8c34a526efb8c6495e7b26')
	iv=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(iv)
	enc=src.match(/enc":"(.+?)"/)[1]
	enc=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(enc)
	c=java.createSymmetricCrypto('AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding',key, iv)
	b=c.decryptStr(enc)
b+con

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束

content=java.getElement("$.content");
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody");
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){
result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>
